Message: How did I perform, should I go signing in front of a public?
You have potential, but your pitch was off-key at times. Practice more and you'll see improvement.
How was it? Tomorrow, I had to sing for my moms birthday.
Your emotional delivery was strong, but your tone was inconsistent. Focus on maintaining a consistent tone and you'll shine. Don't worry, you can do it!
Okay. It the first time I am doing, do I have a room of improvement?
Yes, there are areas where you can improve. But don't be discouraged. With practice, you'll get better. Just remember to breathe deeply and relax before performing. You got this!
